author: mandrigin
content:
> Upon request, I can try to rewrite the spec in my own notation, based on Igor's current spec draft, trying to honor your format. Maybe this can help us iterate and move your draft to completion faster.
<@!682078300234973185> I've merged the draft, so feel free to change the notation and submit a PR. I personally all up to standardize it. There are even 2 issues in this repo now.

author: mandrigin
content: okay, I've added a couple of issues, feel free to create more issues if you feel some more discussions are necessary
